scripts.start: yarn run build && yarn run serve
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.build-css: sass static/sass/main.scss static/css/main.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed && postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.copy-3rd-party-js: yarn run copy-global-nav && yarn run copy-latest-news && yarn run copy-cookie-policy
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
scripts.watch: sass static/sass/main.scss static/css/main.css --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed --watch && postcss --map false --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css'
